Module gameplatform.gameview

Expand source code 
from gamemodel import GameModel, Node, Player, Color
from utils import clear_screen

class GameView():
    """Represents the view model responsible for rendering a game model to the screen.
    """    
    __model : GameModel
    __left_padding = 6 # in characters

    __top_msg_buffer : list [str]
    ''' A buffer holding message above the board that the controller can display.\n
        Currently indices are mapped to players pieces
        Index 0 is reserved for player 0 (Black pieces)
        Index 1 is reserved for player 1 (White pieces)
    '''         
    __msg_buffer : list[str] # buffer for holding messages that the controller wants to display
    """A buffer holding messages that the controller wants to display.\n
    Currently the indices are mapped to conceptually different parts of the UI.\n
    Index 0 is reserved for "notifications" - miscellaneous information to convey to the user when something happens in the game.\n I.e. the user entered an invalid node, the user formed a mill, etc.
    Index 1 is reserved for "action prompts" which are meant to convey to the user what they should do to advance the game.\n
    Index 2 is reserved for Phase notification.
    Other indices are reserved for future expansion.
    """
    __buffer_length = 3
    __top_buffer_length = 2

    def __init__(self, model : GameModel):
        self.__msg_buffer = ["" for _ in range(self.__buffer_length)]
        self.__top_msg_buffer = ["" for _ in range(self.__top_buffer_length)]
        self.__model = model
        self.__model.register_listener(self.draw_board)

    def print_surrender_message(self, surrending_player : Player, winner : Player):
        clear_screen()
        print("Player " + surrending_player.color.name + " surrenders!")
        print("Congratulations " + str(winner.color.name) + "!")

    def print_win_message(self, winner : Player):
        clear_screen()
        print("Congratulations " + str(winner.color.name) + "!")

    def print_draw_message(self):
        clear_screen()
        print("The game ends in a draw!") 

    def node_to_str(self, node : Node) -> str:
        """Converts a given node to string character representation based on the piece at this node.

        Arguments:
            node {Node} ── the node to convert

        Returns:
            str -- the string representation
        """
        if (node.piece == None):
            return " "
        elif (node.piece.owner.color == Color.BLACK):
            return "○"
        elif (node.piece.owner.color == Color.WHITE):
            return "●"

    def __format_phase(self, color : Color):
        player = self.__get_matching_player(color)
        if player is None: return " "
        
        return str(player.get_phase())
    
    def __format_pieces(self, color : Color):
        player = self.__get_matching_player(color)
        if player is None: return "  "
        pieces_str = str(player.get_active_pieces())

        if len(pieces_str) > 1:
            return pieces_str + " / " + str(player.get_max_pieces())
        else:
            return pieces_str + " / " + str(player.get_max_pieces()) + " "
        
    def __format_pieces_off_board(self, color : Color):
        player = self.__get_matching_player(color)
        if player is None: return " "
        str_pieces_ob = str(player.get_pieces_to_place())
        max_player_pieces = str(player.get_max_pieces())
        return str_pieces_ob + "/" + max_player_pieces
        
    def __get_matching_player(self, color : Color):
        players = self.__model.get_all_players()
        player : Player = None

        # find player matching the color
        for ply in players:
            if ply.color == color:
                player = ply
                break
        return player


    def __format_player_name(self, color : Color):
        player = self.__get_matching_player(color)
        if player is None: return " "
        return player.get_name()

    def set_action_prompt(self, prompt : str):
        self.__msg_buffer[1] = prompt
        self.draw_board()
    
    def clear_action_prompt(self):
        self.__msg_buffer[1] = ""
        self.draw_board()
    
    def set_notification_info(self, info : str):
        self.__msg_buffer[0] = info
        self.draw_board()
    
    def clear_notification_info(self):
        self.__msg_buffer[0] = ""
        self.draw_board()

    def __draw_notification_buffer(self):
        player = self.__model.get_current_player()
        self.__msg_buffer[2] = "Player " + player.get_name() + " is currently in Phase " + self.__format_phase(player.color)
        for line in self.__msg_buffer:
            print(line)
    
    def __draw_top_notification_buffer(self):
        self.__top_msg_buffer[0] = "Player " + self.__format_player_name(Color.BLACK) + " pieces off board: " + self.__format_pieces_off_board(Color.BLACK)
        self.__top_msg_buffer[1] = "Player " + self.__format_player_name(Color.WHITE) + " pieces off board: " + self.__format_pieces_off_board(Color.WHITE)
        for line in self.__top_msg_buffer:
            print(line)

    def draw_board(self):
        clear_screen()
        nodes : list[Node] = self.__model.board.get_nodes()
        iter_nodes = iter(map(lambda x: self.node_to_str(x), nodes))

        self.__draw_top_notification_buffer()
        print(" "*self.__left_padding,"   0                 1                  2                                                ")
        print(" "*(self.__left_padding+1),next(iter_nodes),"───────────────",next(iter_nodes),"────────────────",next(iter_nodes),"                ┌────────────────────────────────────┐")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │\                │                / │       " +                                                "          │RULES GOES IN HERE                  │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │ \               │               /  │       " +                                                "          │LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET          │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │  \ 3            │ 4            / 5 │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │  ",next(iter_nodes),"───────────",next(iter_nodes),"───────────",next(iter_nodes), "   │                 │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │             │             │    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │             │             │    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │      6      │ 7         8 │    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │   ",next(iter_nodes),"──────",next(iter_nodes),"───────",next(iter_nodes), "  │    │                 │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │    │                  │   │    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │9  │ 10 │ 11               │12 │ 13 │ 14    " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*(self.__left_padding+1),next(iter_nodes),"─",next(iter_nodes),"──",next(iter_nodes),"                ",next(iter_nodes),"─",next(iter_nodes)," ─",next(iter_nodes),"                │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │    │                  │   │    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │    │ 15        16     │ 17│    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │   ",next(iter_nodes),"──────",next(iter_nodes),"───────",next(iter_nodes), "  │    │                 │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │             │             │    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │             │             │    │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │   │   18        │  19         │ 20 │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │  ",next(iter_nodes),"───────────",next(iter_nodes),"───────────",next(iter_nodes), "   │                 │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │  /              │              \   │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │ /               │               \  │       " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*self.__left_padding," │/ 21             │  22            \ │ 23    " +                                                "          │                                    │")
        print(" "*(self.__left_padding+1),next(iter_nodes),"───────────────",next(iter_nodes),"────────────────",next(iter_nodes),"                └────────────────────────────────────┘")
        self.__draw_notification_buffer()
